messages.content: Hey can you write me a python program that prints every even number up to a 100?
squid soup better than a soup with fresh ideas?

That depends on who you ask.  Some would argue that squid soup has more ideas than any singular soup.  Others would argue that fresh ideas is a better soup because it is novel and has more potentialApplications.  There are even some that would argue that squid and fresh ideas is the best soup due to the unique flavor that combines the two.
